knowledgeTasks.name: Travel Assistant
knowledgeTasks.description: This is used to make ontology

answer.text: An e–ticket (electronic ticket) is a paperless electronic document with a unique confirmation number that neatly replaces the hassles of a paper ticket. When you purchase an e–ticket, we email it to you after the booking is complete. Simply print it out and bring it with you – along with a valid photo ID – to the airline counter when checking in for your flight.

alternateQuestions.question: What money would I get as cancellation charges.

answer.text: the cancellation charges depend on the airline, sector, class of booking, and time of cancellation.

faqs.question: I need to cancel my flight, what’s the latest I can do this by
faqs.label: I need to cancel my flight, what’s the latest I can do this by

answer.text: you can cancel your flight no later than 3 hours before the time of departure.

faqs.question: How do I print my ticket

alternateQuestions.question: What are ways to print ticket.

faqs.label: How do I print my ticket

answer.text: Enter your mobile number and you’ll be able to see your e–ticket. Print it or email it.

faqs.question: How do I know my reservation was booked
faqs.label: How do I know my reservation was booked

answer.text: We’ll send you an SMS and an email to confirm your flight booking.

faqs.question: How do I get my e-ticket details
faqs.label: How do I get my e-ticket details

answer.text: We’ll send your e–ticket details to the email address you gave us when you made your reservation.
